Package controller

Class ModifyCustomerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.Login
      • controller.MainMenu
        • controller.AddCustomerController
          • controller.ModifyCustomerController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ModifyCustomerController
extends AddCustomerController
    This class has the methods for Modifying Customers.

    The AppointmentsController extends the AddCustomerController class. It has methods that allow the user to change and update customer elements.

      • setLocation

        public void setLocation​(Customer person)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        The method sets up the current customers location. This method takes the customer that we are modifying and sets up their current location and their areas.
        Parameters:
        person - customer
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • setCustomer

        public void setCustomer​(Customer person)
        The method sets the stage with the selected customer from the prior stage. This method makes sure that all of the proper fx ids are filled with the proper customer information.
        Parameters:
        person - customer

      • updateCustomer

        public void updateCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        The method updates the appointment. This method does time checks to make that the inputs are correct and filled out. It checks all input and then calls the updateCustomer from Customer DAO and loads the updated customer into the database.
        Parameters:
        event - on click

      • initialize

        public void initialize​(java.net.URL location,
                       java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
        The method initializes the methods for set up.

        This method sets up the information needed for the user to add an appointment using the interface Initializable which helps call the methods after the controller has been initialized after the root element has processed.

        Specified by:
        initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
        Overrides:
        initialize in class AddCustomerController
        Parameters:
        location - The url used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the url is not known.
        resourceBundle - The resources used to localize the root object, or null if the root object was not localized.
